overview: Toei Animation posted a two-hour, English-subtitled compilation film titled for the KADO - The Right Answer television anime series on YouTube on Tuesday May 22 2018. The film is listed as the anime's "episode 12.5" and has the title KADO: Beyond Information. The video will be available until June 4 at 10:00 a.m. JST. (ANN)
title: KADO: Beyond Information
